description: even with fixing cert issue, it doesnt work - always shows error "address family not supported by protocol"
Doesn't work at all. Can't get past the account screen

Try this if you get 0.0.0.2 - Remote Desktop Connection:

https://askubuntu.com/questions/901448/citrix-receiver-error-1000119

This works well once you get the certificate installed. If you google the certificate error you get, you can find a page on the Citrix website that will describe the process of adding the CA/certificate to the Citrix trusted certificate store (for Citrix, not the browser or the OS), then it works. I used Chromium 79.0.3945.79. 

An .ica file is downloaded - click on it and Chromium will fire up the Citrix browser. Loaded on my three-monitor setup with sound, the whole deal.
summary: Working well with a few technical prep steps for Ubuntu 18.04

description: It works perfectly but the size of all the apps and texts is too small. Did everything but can't increase. Please help if you can. Thank you.
summary: Great App with some issues for me

description: This citrix workspace app works for me

Works well using Citrix Workspace app 1912 for Linux on Ubuntu 18.04.4 LTS with Firefox 73.0.1 for published apps.

I've found no issues using Citrix Workspace app 1912 (icaclientWeb_19.12.0.19_amd64.deb) on Ubuntu 18.04.4 LTS when accessing applications published via Citrix (Access) Gateway and using Firefox 73.0.1 (64-bit).

No certificate issues - did not have to symlink or import certificates.

Although in-place upgrade is possible (presumably the Linux version does similar checks as the versions for other OSes), I'd advise uninstalling any previous version prior to install unless you have a specific reason not to.
summary: Great application - should get better reviews for current version

Doesn't work well on Linux.

In our company, we have to use Microsoft products via a Citrix hosted environment while our remaining work depends strongly on an *IX environment. It is painful to use Citrix and its environment because its stability could be improved. Freezing windows, which I have to “xkill” and open again, is the way to operate. I do not consider this as a productive way of operation. Also the exchange of via the mouse "taken" text does not work naturally. Always additional keystroke are required, which break this workflow.
summary: No well integrated product with improvable stability

description:
Bei Firefox ist folgendes im terminal einzugeben:

sudo ln -s /usr/share/ca-certificates/mozilla/* /opt/Citrix/ICAClient/keystore/cacerts/
summary: Kleiner Eingriff bei Mozilla notwendig, sonst läuft es wie es soll

description:
This installation wouldn`t run without this terminal advice from user mx! (After installation you have to do this: 
sudo ln -s /usr/share/ca-certificates/mozilla/* /opt/Citrix/ICAClient/keystore/cacerts/
sudo c_rehash /opt/Citrix/ICAClient/keystore/cacerts/).
summary: The App works, after a extra terminal command, really good. Thank you!
